MEDLARS: Report on the Evaluation of Its Operating Efficiency .A Lancaster, F.W. A comprehensive program to evaluate the performance of MEDLARS was conducted by the National Library of Medicine in 1966 and 1967.. This report describes the methodology used and presents a summary of the principal results, conclusions, and recommendations.. .X 24	3	75 30	1	75 38	1	75 43	1	75 47	1	75 50	1	75 52	1	75 57	1	75 62	1	75 65	3	75 66	2	75 70	1	75 71	2	75 72	2	75 73	1	75 74	2	75 75	24	75 76	2	75 77	2	75 78	3	75 79	3	75 80	2	75 81	3	75 82	3	75 83	2	75 86	1	75 119	1	75 122	1	75 137	1	75 149	2	75 153	1	75 154	2	75 156	2	75 176	1	75 177	1	75 210	1	75 211	2	75 212	2	75 213	1	75 214	1	75 245	1	75 247	1	75 277	1	75 278	1	75 279	2	75 280	2	75 281	1	75 309	1	75 315	1	75 329	1	75 336	2	75 382	3	75 386	1	75 395	1	75 398	1	75 419	1	75 441	1	75 474	1	75 486	2	75 495	1	75 514	1	75 523	1	75 531	1	75 547	1	75 554	1	75 565	2	75 572	1	75 575	1	75 577	1	75 581	1	75 586	2	75 594	1	75 595	1	75 596	1	75 606	1	75 608	2	75 609	1	75 619	1	75 636	1	75 644	1	75 649	1	75 658	1	75 660	2	75 666	1	75 684	1	75 697	1	75 716	1	75 720	2	75 726	2	75 748	2	75 752	1	75 762	1	75 778	1	75 779	1	75 780	1	75 781	1	75 782	1	75 785	1	75 786	1	75 787	1	75 788	2	75 789	2	75 790	1	75 791	2	75 799	1	75 806	1	75 810	1	75 812	2	75 813	1	75 814	1	75 824	1	75 837	1	75 838	2	75 852	1	75 853	2	75 854	1	75 855	1	75 870	1	75 894	1	75 925	2	75 928	1	75 955	1	75 956	2	75 958	1	75 961	1	75 963	1	75 984	2	75 990	1	75 991	1	75 1011	2	75 1035	1	75 1055	1	75 1074	1	75 1075	1	75 1083	2	75 1086	1	75 1112	1	75 1213	1	75 1255	1	75 1282	1	75 1294	3	75 1295	1	75 1297	1	75 1303	1	75 1361	1	75 1391	1	75 1393	1	75 1400	1	75 1402	1	75 1404	1	75 1413	1	75 1429	1	75 1430	1	75 1431	1	75 1445	1	75 1451	1	75 1451	1	75
